sentence: So many leaders in that  effort with so many big ideas were willing to partner in a bipartisan  way: Pramila Jayapal, Linda Sanchez, Adriano Espaillat,  Tom Suozzi,  Veronica Escobar, and so many others.
Eshoo (D-CA), Adriano Espaillat (D-NY), Dwight Evans (D-PA), Lois Frankel (D-FL), Marcia L.
(D-Mo.), Steve Cohen (D-Tenn.), Adriano Espaillat (D-N.Y.), John Garamendi (D-Calif.), Henry C.
Espaillat for his constant  leadership on this issue.
Representatives Earl Blumenauer, Tony Cárdenas, Judy Chu, Adriano Espaillat, Chuy García, Sylvia R.

Speaker, I thank Chairman Cole for his leadership and Ranking  Member Espaillat and our subcommittee members and their staff and our  staff for their work, and I urge my colleagues to vote ``yes.''

Mr.
